vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#895-900) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#897-898)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Address.isContract (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#208-217) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
__unstable__TokenVault.transfer (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#1053-1056) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,amount) (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#1054-1055)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#571-579) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(openingTime >= block.timestamp,TimedCrowdsale: opening time is before current time) (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#573)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#598-601) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#600)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#607-610) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsaleImpl.sol#609)
